description: Compare Old French aneler, anheler. See anhelation.

verbs.description: anhele (third-person singular simple present anheles, present participle anheling, simple past and past participle anheled)

entries.meaning: (obsolete, intransitive) To pant; to be breathlessly anxious or eager (for).
examples: They anheale  [â€¦]  for the fruit of our convocation.
